page.title: 09VILLAGE HALLS MK WESTON AREA
page.content: Barningham & Hopton have purpose built halls.Market Weston hall was formerly, a small village school of one room & a kitchen.Each hall is overseen by a man- agement committee.Hire charges pay for upkeep but major repairs are paid for by fund raisings.These halls play a big role in village life as they are used for a great variety of events: ameteur dramatics,clubs for retired people, dances, Guides & Brownies, Playschool, Toddler clubs, Parish Council meetings, WI & women's clubs, general & local elections.Market Weston hall, being smaller, has more limited uses.Most villages in our rural area have their hall & in many cases it forms a major meeting place for village events.
